quote: If you want to achieve anything in this world, you have to get used to the idea that not everyone will like you. – Simon Sinek
fact: To "testify" was based on men in the Roman court swearing to a statement made by swearing on their testicles.
joke: What do you call a criminal going down the stairs? Condescending
